text: if you like roasted vegetables like
these crispy potatoes as much as I do
then you'll appreciate this innovative
solution for roasting vegetables we get
a lot of comments a lot of calls telling
us here in the test kitchens that their
roasted vegetables turn out soggy like
these here I'm going to show you a
really great way to roast vegetables and
you'll have success every single time
I'm using baby carrots I'm using baby
Yukon Gold potatoes some shallots and
fennel and I'm just giving these
vegetables a little bit of a drizzle of
olive oil and then a liberal sprinkling
of salt and I'm just going to toss them
together with my hands now I'm doing
this separately because I'm gonna roast
them by size it's very important when
you're roasting vegetables that you have
everything cut in a uniform way so that
the vegetables are all the same size and
they cook at the same rate I have an
oven preheated to 500 degrees with the
rack set in the lower third of the oven
and a baking sheet preheated I'm going
to go grab that and I'm going to roast
off the vegetables so my pan is really
nice and hot take the vegetables and put
them right onto the pan and you hear
that that sear is telling you that the
vegetables are getting a good start and
they're gonna start to caramelize
quicker they're not gonna steam I'm
putting the potatoes cut side down
because you want the starchy surface of
the potato to be in direct contact with
the pan same thing with the shallots and
last but not least the fennel and you
see that there's still some room around
vegetables so we didn't overcrowd the
pan and if you overcrowded the pan
you're gonna create steam and that's
going to inhibit the caramelization and
I'm gonna put these back into the oven
500 degrees for about 20 to 25 minutes
checking halfway through and rotating if
need be
so it's been about 25 minutes the
vegetables have a really nice color on
them look at how beautiful the potatoes
are they're so nice and crisp and so
there you have it the solution to better
and faster roasting if you have any
kitchen conundrums that you need salt
write in the comments section below
or use the hashtag kitchen conundrums
and let me know what I can do for you
hey guys thanks for watching do you have
a kitchen conundrum that you need solved
well if you do write in the comments
section below and as always click
